content.title: About Me
content.details: Experienced race car driver. Passionate about speed and competition. Skilled in vehicle dynamics and race strategy.

nestedInformation.title: School Support
nestedDetails: Private tutoring for primary school children

content.title: Certifications
details: Certified Race Car Driver - International Racing Federation (2021)
Advanced Vehicle Dynamics Certification - Racing Academy (2019)

nestedInformation.title: Mushroom Cup Circuit
nestedInformation.subtitle: Lead Driver.
nestedDetails: Competed in various races and championships, demonstrating exceptional driving skills and strategic thinking.
Collaborated with the pit crew to optimize vehicle performance and race strategies.

nestedInformation.title: Flower Cup
nestedInformation.subtitle: Junior Driver.
nestedDetails: Participated in local races, gaining valuable experience and honing driving techniques.
Assisted in vehicle maintenance and setup to ensure optimal performance during races.

nestedInformation.title: Star Cup
nestedInformation.subtitle: Intern Driver.
nestedDetails: Supported senior drivers during races and practice sessions.
Learned the fundamentals of race car driving and vehicle dynamics.

nestedInformation.title: Racing Academy
nestedInformation.subtitle: Diploma in Advanced Race Car Driving.
nestedDetails: Completed a comprehensive program covering advanced driving techniques, vehicle dynamics, and race strategy.
Graduated with honors, recognized for exceptional performance and dedication.

nestedInformation.title: Speedway High School
nestedInformation.subtitle: High School Diploma.
nestedDetails: Focused on physical education and extracurricular activities related to motorsports.
Participated in various school events and competitions, showcasing leadership and teamwork skills.
